column2: the steaks were delicious. We ordered the steaks and frites and the filet mignon. Both cooked perfectly at medium rare. The frites were so delicious
column3: if you don't order the meal
column4: would recommend getting them as a side. We also ordered the mushrooms which were good though a bit over seasoned. We had the chocolate pie as dessert
column5: and they were so sweet they added a surprise candle.
